message.body: if this game does not run laggfree nier automata wont either
It might just be that Lime is running other programs slowing DS3 down.
Time to star tthe Death Counts
I see a Steam message box, part of it.
Okay, I closed most of my apps
yeah they raised the grafics a lot from ds23 to ds3
Yeah i saw myself play SAO:FB lmao
Let's see how this plays out
We can just see Lime typing messages.
i dont think this will be enjoyable when lagging
Yeah, this is not gud HeheHehe
Is this when we say then git gud? PoiPoi
try to upgrade you gpu driver
It's better at smaller screen, but not as gud as DS2 HeheHehe
you should update your driver and probably try this:

If you still want some FPS try this: edit the dark souls 3 profile on nvidia control panel, and disable everything FXAA and Texture filtering, choose the maximum performance on every option, and only let enable the trible buffering, vsync, segmented optimization, max of pre-renderized fps = 4, VR pre-renderized fps = 1
In the meantime, I'll leave the game closed in case I need to refund limebeSB
Lime playlist. ITs been some time.
you should definitely find a way to update the driver
iirc I actually have the latest driver for my graphic card limebeSB
I forget, are the quote bots here?
201. "But that would basically be 4 Robbie Rottens pounding you" - Cirno 2017
I lotteried, and for a Lime one.
but i wouldnt play it like that
Yeah, I'd rather die lots than go slowmo Derpjoubu
So, I don't need to redownload it so I can kill Lime? limebePB
If this doesn't work, I give up and refund HeheHehe
Doesn't look much better, but seems playable.
Still pretty skippy on my end.
Yeah, Xsplit is one of the culprit for the game being choppy HeheHehe
Lemme try closing Xsplit for a moment
The game is smooth now Daijoubu
But the strim is still choppy memeFace
It looks a bit better now.
In that case, I'll continue TPFufun
I wanna try not using any app for now just be on the safe side limebeSB
ok i managed to close wa2
wasnt as hard as the first time
instead of limited used for spells
forward and left klick at the same time
the kick is useful for breaking block btw
you can do a jump attack by doing it with a a strong attack
so kick but with strong attack instead
It just helped me realize how bad I am at these games.
I died to him so much. XD
Gotta get something to eat, afk.
there is a strong dude to the left of that gate
btw this game has many references to dark souls 1
but not that much to ds2
well each game has its own story
i always keep my main damage stat twice as high as stamina and life
btw dont forget the strong dude
Oh yeah, you can abuse a tree at this shrine to reach places before you get the key.
yes and you get the silver serpent ring there
but the jump needs some practice
Ah. I got some food in me, I feel much better.
I cheese this guy when I fought him.
you should make it a habit to target your enemies
you coudl try to parry him
I cheesed it, by using a bow and the tree.
you can also throw him off the cliff
if you throw him off the cliff his items will be where he was once you rest at the bonfire
else you will miss your attacks
i think you didnt hit him once for a couple of tries
tell me your address and i will gift you a gamepad HeheHehe
Ugh, I've had Rabi-Ribi music stuck in my head since last night, I blame Lime.
a mouse with side buttons would be helpful
well a third hand would also work
i bet on your second playthrough you firsttry him
bleeding is op in pve btw
well just wanted to give you the option
you could also go for high strength weapons
the thing is you usually dont have time to attack a lot
so better make your hots count
to spawn npcs and players for bosse sand do pvp
you can go hollow by doing a questline though
well you just get some items
but the jump is hard to do
It took me a few minutes to get it, and I watched a video beforehand.
you need to run up the tree turn to the right and jump
you need to gain a lot of height on the tree
damn this is the most interesting dark souls gameplay ive seen Daijoubu
try to run up the tree for now
to see how high you cna get
let me check for a video
you dont have to do this
The key isn't too far, right?
its 10k or 20k souls for the key if i remember correctly
it took me an eternity to find out how to continue from there btw
I'm confused, why am I not getting Defeat all enemies for A-1?
Is that one chasing me around need to be beaten?

they can drop better stuff if they transform though
liem whi r u a robot MikuDerp

there are nice items up there

the damage is good for now too

u need soapstone cos u smell MikuDerp

you can use it two handed
Be careful not to hit an npc.
you need to get use to the range first
also for some situations you might to one hand it
bomb it once and the hit it while ist staggering
its like kick but with heavy attack button instead
and there is a attack after roll too
you should get used to using all of them in the right situation
There is a crystal lizard nearby.
raw infusion is good if you dont plan to raise str and dex much
you dont need to go that close with this weapon btw
but there is good stuff down there
I just looked into it, those knights with the spear can drop it.
he will learn more infusions later
